Header: “Replicas” scheduled to be released this month
Content: “Replicas” is an American science fiction thriller film directed by Jeffrey Nachmanoff and written by Chad St. John from a story by Stephen Hamel. The film tells the story of a neuroscientist who violates the law and scientific principles to bring his family members back to life after they die in a car accident. The film stars Keanu Reeves, Alice Eve and Thomas Middleditch. It is scheduled to be released on 11th of this month by Entertainment Studios Motion Pictures.
